278638.「そなたも ここに来るまでに 目にしたと思うが\n 突然 風が荒ぶりだして 身の:
I'm sure you saw before coming here, but out
of nowhere the winds began to rage, carrying
with it an ominous vibe of calamity.

278639.「暴風の奥でうごめく 巨大な影を見た者もおる。\n このままでは 遠からず 何か:
Some say they've seen a huge shadow hiding
inside the storm. At this rate, it won't be too
long before something horrible happens...

278645.「もうすぐ お産の子も 落ち着きがなくて……\n 産気づくまでに 風を鎮めないと:
The one about to give birth is also making me anxious...I'm worried that if the winds don't calm before she goes into labor, the baby
won't be delivered safely.

278646.「それに 私は風乗りだもの。\n アズランの風が こんなに荒れているのを\n 放:
And besides, I'm a Wind Rider! I can't just
leave the winds blowing as they are!

278648.「<pc>よ この通り フウラは\n 風乗りとして 立派にやっておる。:
As you can see, <pc>... Fuura is
doing quite splendid as a Wind Rider.

278649.「こたびの異変は 風にまつわるものだ。\n フウラが チカラになれる事も あるだ:
Since the wind is the issue at hand this time,
Fuura may be able to lend you her help. Please
take her with you.

278662.「こうして 風に吹かれているだけで\n ひとりぼっちで 泣いているような\n ひ:
Just being blown by the wind like this makes
me feel terribly sad, as if I'm crying all
alone.

278666.「そなたが マガツカゼを鎮めてくれたおかげで\n 声を 届けられるようになった。:
You have calmed Magatkaze, and now we can
make our voices heard.

278694.「ふっ。\n 王だからこそ……だよ。:
Phew. It's because...
I'm the king.

278695.「災厄の王は あまりにも強い……。\n 今 この瞬間 そんな相手から 国を守り\:
The King of Calamity is too strong... and at this moment, we must reward the soldiers who are fighting to protect our country against
such an opponent.

278697.「それに 剣技では お前に かなわなくとも\n 馬術じゃ 俺が 国で一番なんだ。:
And even though I can't match you in
swordsmanship, I'm the best in the country in
horsemanship.

278699.「お前が強いのは わかっている。\n だが そういう問題じゃない。:
I know you are strong. But that's not the
point.

278709.「なぜ あなたが……\n その たづなを 持っているのですか。: Why do you have that Tazuna?

278745.「ああ よかった～！ やっと来れた！\n 何度 天星郷を出ようとしても\n うま:
Oh, thank God~! I'm finally here! No matter
how many times I tried to leave Heaven, I just
couldn't get out.

278746.「あっ！ 母さん！ \n 母さんが 僕を呼んでくれたんだね。\n ありがとう～！: Ah! Mom! You called me, Mom. Thank you~!

278747.「あっ！ 父さん！ \n 父さんが 僕を呼んでくれたんだね。\n ありがとう～！: Ah! Dad! You called me. Thank you!

278750.「えへへ。僕 コウリンっていうんだ。\n ハクオウ父さんが コウリンって名前を\:
Hehehe. My name is Kourin. Father Hakuo gave
me the name Kourin.

278751.「僕が タマゴだった時に ハクオウ父さんと\n <pc>母さんに 育ててもらった:
When I was an egg, my father Hakuo and my
<pc>mother raised me, so now it's my
turn to return the favor.

278752.「僕が タマゴだった時に ハクオウ父さんと\n <pc>父さんに 育ててもらった:
When I was an egg, my father Hakuo and my
<pc> father raised me, so now it's my
turn to return the favor.

278753.「あの王様と 同じ名前なのね。\n ふふっ！ よろしくね コウリンちゃん！:
So you have the same name as that king.
Phew! Nice to meet you, Kourin!

278768.「暗くて……とても さびしい所だね。\n こんな場所に ずっといたら\n 余計に:
It's so dark and... so lonely. I'd be even
sadder if I had to stay in a place like this
forever...

278790.「この地は やがて……\n 大いなる災厄によって 滅びを迎えます。\n それを:
The land will soon be brought to ruin by a
great calamity. There is no way to avoid it.

278811.「なぜ 抵抗する！！\n 私は この身をもって チカラおよばず\n 敗北する絶望:
Why do you resist? I have experienced
firsthand the despair of being defeated beyond
my ability!

278812.「それは何よりも 恐ろしいものなのに……\n なぜ 同じ未来を くり返そうとする:
Why would anyone want to repeat the same
future when it's so much scarier than anything
else?

278820.「目を覚ませ。\n お前の剣は いかなる理由があろうと\n 仲間を 傷つけるため:
Wake up. Your sword is not meant to hurt your
companions for any reason.

278827.「お前は ヤマカミヌの誇りを 守り通した。\n たとえ 国が滅びようとも お前が:
You kept the pride of Yamakaminu alive. Even if the nation had perished, your presence would have allowed the people to meet their
end nobly.

278831.「お前が負けたのは 他者に背を向け\n ただひとりで 戦ったからだ。\n それで:
You lost because you turned your back on
others and fought alone. Then, one day, there
will surely be a limit.

278832.「今の お前には 仲間がいるだろう。 \n 共に戦って 災厄の王を 退けるのだ。:
Now you have a companion. Together you will
fight and defeat the King of Calamity.

278836.「……コウリン。\n お前も そう思っていたのか？: Kourin. Did you think so too?

278838.「父さんに言いたいことがあるからって この人は\n ずっと僕たちのそばに いてく:
He was there for us the whole time because he
had something to say to my dad.

278840.「父さんを傷つけるヤツは 僕が許さないぞ！\n 消えろっ！！:
I'll never forgive you for hurting my father!
Get out of here!

278855.「ゆえに 天使である あなたには\n 見守っていて いただきたいのです。:
Therefore, I ask you, my angel, to watch over
them.

278856.「今の私には 信頼できる仲間がいる。\n もう 負けることはありません。:
Now I have companions I can trust. I will not
lose anymore.

278857.「……やっと わかったのです。\n 私は ずっと 多くの人々から \n 深い信頼:
I finally understood. All along, I'd been the
recipient of deep trust and affection from so
many people.

278858.「それなのに 愚かな私は……\n それをひとつも 受け取ろうとしなかった。:
And yet, I was foolish enough not to accept a
single one of them.

278870.「やっと……６０００年続いた 私の戦いを\n 終わらせることが できます。:
Finally...I can end my fight that has lasted
6,000 years.

279903.「うむ。かつて アズランの危機を 救ってくれた\n その実力を見込んで そなたに:
Mhm... I'd like you to investigate the cause
of this crisis, seeing as you've helped Azlan
from similar things in the past.

279912.「ねえ 教えて……？\n あなたは 何をそんなに 悲しんでいるの……？: Tell me...? What are you so sad about?

279913.「礼を言うぞ……風に愛されし子よ。: I thank you...beloved child of the wind.

279915.「我が名は コウリン。\n かつて この地にあり 災厄の王に滅ぼされた\n ヤマ:
My name is Kourin. I am the one who once ruled
the Yamakaminu Kingdom, which was destroyed by
the King of Calamity in this land.

279922.「バカを言うな！\n ヤマカミヌの王は お前しかいないんだぞ。:
Don't be stupid! You are the only Yamakaminu
King.

279923.「国の危機である 今 この時\n 王自らが 先陣をきって 戦わなければ\n 彼ら:
If the king himself does not take the lead in
fighting at this time of national crisis, what
will they have to rely on for support?

279925.「こいつに乗った俺は 千人力だぞ。\n 少しは 信頼してもらいたいものだな。:
I'm a thousand strong with this thing on
board. I'd like you to have a little faith in
me.

279927.「たしかに 剣技しか能のない 私では\n お前の代わりに 兵士たちの心の支えに\:
It's true that I, who can only use my
swordsmanship, can't be the emotional support
for the soldiers in your place...

279930.「これは コウリンって王様から 渡されたの！\n マガツカゼを止めたければ これ:
This was given to me by a king named Kourin!
He said if I wanted to stop Magatkaze, I
should take this and talk to you...

279947.「ずっと 会いたかったんだよ。\n 一度は タマゴに戻っちゃったけど\n 僕 す:
I've missed you so much. I went back to being
an egg at one point, but I'm all better now.

279950.「あれ？ これって あの王様のたづなかな？\n いつの間に コウリンちゃんに\n:
Huh? Is this the king's wrath? When did it
get attached to Kourin?

279960.「おかしいなぁ。\n そこら中から ハクオウ父さんの気配を\n 感じるのに 遠く:
That's strange. I can feel Father Hakuo's
presence from everywhere, but he seems so far
away... strange.

279963.「父さんの悲しみを感じて ここまで来たんだ！\n 今度は 僕が 父さんを助けてみ:
I came all this way because I felt your grief!
Now I'm going to save him!

279965.「悲しんでるのは 父さんの方じゃないか……。\n こんな場所にいないで 一緒に帰:
I think it's you, father, who's grieving... and
I don't want you to stay here, let's go home
together!

279970.「父さんは 深翠の試練の時に\n 我を忘れて 暴走してしまった僕を\n 全力で:
I know you did everything you could to stop me
from going out of control during the Deep
Green Trials.

279971.「どれだけ 私が戦って\n 命をすり減らし 抵抗を続けても……\n 結局 すべて:
No matter how much I fought and fought and
fought for my life... in the end, all was
lost.

279974.「チカラを合わせて戦えば そんな結末は\n 回避できるよ。そのために 僕たちがい:
If we fight together, we can avoid such an
outcome. That's why we're here. Let's fight
together!

279975.「だまれ！\n そんな気休めには 虫唾が走る！:
Shut up! I'm salivating at the thought of such
comfort!

279983.「俺の代わりに……ヤマカミヌを……\n 頼む……。: Take my place... in Yamakaminu... please...

279984.「私は 友の命ひとつ 守れない……。: I can't protect my friend's life...

279989.「これで 終わりです！\n もう二度と 戯言を言えぬように\n 殺してあげましょ:
This is the end! I'll kill you so you can't
talk nonsense again!

279996.「お前は 我らの希望だった。\n 私は ずっと お前を 誇りに思っている。:
You were our hope. I will always be proud of
you.

280001.「ありがとう……友よ。\n お前には 心配をかけてばかりだな。:
Thank you my friend. You've been a constant
source of worry for me.

280002.「この戦いは アストルティアに生きる者が\n 背負うべき宿命のようなもの。:
This battle is like a destiny to be borne by
those who live in Astoltia.

280004.「私を信じてくれた 人々の顔が\n 今になって 鮮明に 浮かぶのです。\n その:
I can clearly see the faces of the people who
believed in me. Their faces are smiling, so
kind...

280007.「見事な 戦いでした。\n あなたが 歴代最強の 時の王者と\n 称えられたのも:
It was a great fight. No wonder you were
called the greatest champion of all time.

280008.「神になるなど 私には 分不相応だと\n 今でも 思いますが……:
I still think it's not my place to be a god,
but...

284736.「おお よく来てくれた <pc>！\n エルトナ全土で起きている 異変について\:
Oh, <pc>, you're here! I was hoping
you could help me look into the strange things
happening all over Eltona.

284737.「急に そのような暴風が 吹きはじめたのは\n 悪神の出現による 影響かもしれま:
The sudden appearance of these storms is most
likely the fiend's doing...

284738.「暴風の原因を追えば 悪神のゆくえを\n つかめるかもしれません。:
If we can track down the source of these
storms, we might be able to discern the
fiend's whereabouts.

284739.「このおかしな風のせいで カムシカたちも\n すっかり おびえてしまっているの。:
All of the Azlantelopes are so scared because
of the horrible wind...

284740.「いつもは とっても 穏やかなはずの子たちが\n この風のせいで どんなに なだ:
They're usually so calm...but the wind is
making them not listen to me, no matter how
hard I try.

284741.「おお……なんと 見上げた心がけだ！\n 風乗りとしての態度が 板についてきたな:
Ohh! You've really thought this through! Your
attitude as wind rider has really come into its
own. Your father is very proud of you!

284743.「すみません 自己紹介が遅れてしまいました。\n 私は ユーライザと 申します。:
I apologize for not introducing myself sooner.
My name is Yuliza.

284744.「偉大な英雄として 世界を飛び回り 活躍する\n このお方の おチカラになるため:
As they are a great champion of this world,
I am traveling with them in hopes to assist
them with their heroic deeds.

284745.「エルトナに吹き荒れる 暴風についての調査も\n 微力ながら お手伝いさせてくだ:
I'd also be more than happy to assist in any
way I can regarding these terrible winds.
I'll do the best that I can.

284746.「そっか～！ そうだよね。\n いつも とっても お忙しそうだったから\n お手:
I see! I got it. You're always so busy, so
it's great that you found someone that
can help you out!

284747.「私はフウラ！ 風乗りっていって\n カムシカに乗って このアズランを守るのが\:
My name is Fuura. I'm a Wind Rider, and it's
my duty to protect Azlan by riding on the
Azlantelopes.

284748.「だから こんな暴風は 放っておけないよ。\n 解決できるよう 一緒に がんばろ:
And that's exactly why I have to do something
about these storms! Let's do our best together
in figuring it out, Ms. Yuliza!

284749.「じつは カミハルムイ城にいる 魔瘴研究者の\n ハネツキ博士から 便りがあった:
I received a letter from Dr. Hanetsuki. He is a researcher in Kamiharmui Castle who focuses on demon miasma. It seems that these winds
have some connection with it.

284750.「まずは カミハルムイ城に向かい\n ハネツキ博士に 話を 聞いてくるのが\n:
First, I think you should head over to
Kamiharmui Castle and speak with him.

284751.「この風の運んでくる 不気味な気配……。\n 何が起こっても おかしくはない。\:
Anything could happen with these foreboding
winds blowing... Please be careful on your way
there.

284752.「このあたりは 特に 風が騒いでるよ。\n とても 荒々しいのに 悲しい風……。:
The winds are especially noisy around here.
Very wild, yet sad winds...

284755.「ふたたび かつての恐怖……災厄の王が\n よみがえり この地を滅ぼさんとしてい:
Once again, the old horror, the King of
Calamity, has risen to destroy this land.

284756.「このマガツカゼは その前兆だ。\n やがて 草木は枯れはて 大地は滅びるだろう:
This magatkaze is a sign of things to come.
Soon the grass and trees will wither and the
earth will perish.

284757.「私は とうに 滅びた身ゆえ\n どうしてやることも できぬ。:
I am perished, and there is nothing I can do
about it.

284758.「手遅れになる前に 私のたづなを持って\n 落陽の草原の 北西の外れにある石碑へ:
Before it is too late, take my tazuna to the
stone monument on the northwestern outskirts
of Sunset Meadow.

284759.「かの地には 時の王者 ハクオウが眠っている。\n そのたづなを持っていけば 意:
In that land, Hakuo, the king of time, sleeps.
If you bring the tazuna with you, you will be
able to talk with him, even if he is stubborn.

284760.「ハクオウならば この地に降りかかる災いを\n 必ずや 退けてくれる……。:
Hakuo will surely repel the calamity that
befalls this land...

284761.「ダメ……。\n この地が滅びるなんて 絶対にいやよ！: No... I will not let this place be destroyed!

284763.「待って！\n その人に会って どうすればいいの！？:
Wait! What am I supposed to do when I meet
that guy!

284765.「どうしよう……消えちゃった。\n もう あの人の声は 聞こえないよ……。:
What should I do...he's gone. I can't hear her
voice anymore...

284766.「フウラさん。\n ひとまず そのたづなを持って\n 落陽の草原に 向かってみま:
Ms. Fuura. For now, let's take the tazuna and
head for Sunset Meadow.

284767.「彼があなたに そのたづなを託したのは\n 必ず 理由あっての事だと思います。\:
I am sure he entrusted you with the tazuna for
a reason. I am sure you will understand
something if you go there.

284768.「やはり この暴風には ハクオウが\n 関係しているようですね。\n 急いで 落:
After all, it seems that Hakuo has something
to do with this storm. Let's hurry up and head
for the Sunset Meadow stone monument.

284770.「マガツカゼは この石碑から\n 吹いてきていたんだ。\n そして ここからエル:
Magatkaze was blowing from this stone
monument. And it spread from here to Eltona.

284771.「悲しんでるのは この石碑にいるヒト……\n ハクオウさんだったんだ……。:
The one who is grieving is the person on this
stone monument... it was Mr. Hakuo...

284772.「何が そんなに悲しいの……？: What are you so sad about...?

284773.「もはや 一刻の猶予もない。\n 明日 俺は ヤマカミヌの全軍を率いて\n 災厄:
There is not a moment to lose. Tomorrow, I
will lead the entire army of Yamakaminu to
defeat the King of Calamity!

284774.「もちろん お前にも来てもらうぞ。\n その絶世の剣技を 思う存分 披露してくれ:
Of course, I'll have you come too. Show us
your superb swordsmanship to your heart's
content.

284775.「お前だけは 絶対に 死なすわけにはいかない。\n 戦いの指揮は 私が執るから:
You are the only one who must not die. I will
lead the battle, and you should return to your
country and protect your people.

284776.「だからこそ この一命を賭して\n 刺しちがえてでも 災厄の王を討ってみせよう。:
That is why I will risk my life to avenge the King of Calamity, even if it means stabbing him in the back. All you have to do is witness
it.

284777.「そんな死に方は 俺が許さん。\n お前は 王以上の……英雄と呼ばれるに\n ふ:
I will not allow you to die that way. You are
more than a king... you are worthy to be
called a hero, Hakuo.

284778.「たとえ お前自身が そう思わなくとも\n 俺は お前を 信じている。:
I believe in you even if you don't believe it
yourself.

284779.「兵士達だって 皆 そう思っているぞ。\n お前が 戦場で剣を振るう時は\n 皆:
The soldiers think so, too. When you wield a
sword on the battlefield, everyone's morale is
very high.

284780.「お前が 剣技だけの男で あるものかよ。\n まったく 何度言ったら わかるのか:
You're not just a man of swordsmanship. How
many times have I told you... You really are a
hardcore clueless person.

284781.「明日は 決戦だ。\n どんな戦場でも お前と一緒なら 怖くない。\n 頼りにし:
Tomorrow is the decisive battle. No matter
what the battlefield, I'm not afraid if I'm
with you. I'm counting on you, Hakuo.

284782.「今のは 何……？\n この たづなが 見せてくれたの？: What was that? Did this Tazuna show me that?

284783.「この風が続くと この地は滅びるって言われた。\n 私は そんなの 絶対にいや！:
I was told that if this wind continued, the
land would perish. I absolutely refuse to
allow that to happen!

284784.「コウリンさんは あなたなら この地を必ず\n 救ってくれるだろうって 言ってた:
Mr. Kourin said you would save this place!
Please! Stop this wind!

284786.「これは 傑作なことだな！\n あの人は まだ そんなことを\n 言っているのか:
This is a masterpiece! That man is still
talking like that!

284787.「この地に再び あの忌まわしき\n 災厄の王が 出現してしまった……。\n エル:
Once again, that abominable King of Calamity
has reappeared in this land... and Eltona
Continent is at an end.

284788.「美しき森は枯れ 人々は死に……\n むくろが 山と築かれるでしょう。\n そし:
The beautiful forests will die, the people
will die, and the mukuro will be built into
mountains. And the country will perish.

284789.「そう……。\n かつてのヤマカミヌが そうであったように！: Yes... just as Yamakaminu once was!

284790.「私は 時の王者として ヤマカミヌを救うため\n 全てを賭けて 戦いましたが……:
As the champion of time, I risked everything
to save Yamakaminu, but I was defeated. The
future of the world is inevitable.

284791.「ならば その運命に抗って 苦しむより……\n 死を受け入れ 静かに消える方がい:
Then, instead of suffering against your
fate... wouldn't it be better to accept death
and quietly disappear?

284792.「そうすれば……失う痛みを 味わうこともない。\n ひとり孤独に 取り残されるこ:
That way... you won't have to experience the
pain of loss. And you won't be left all alone.

284794.「消えちゃった……。\n 私の言葉じゃ 届かないんだ……。: He's gone... my words don't reach him...

284795.「あの記憶……きっと ハクオウさんにとって\n コウリンさんは 大切な人のはず…:
That memory... Mr. Kourin must be very
important to Mr. Hakuo... Maybe Mr. Kourin's
words will reach him...

284797.「大丈夫です フウラさん。\n まだ 希望はありますから。: Don't worry, Ms. Fuura. There is still hope.

284799.「私に 考えがあります。\n 今しばらくの間 この件は\n 預けていただけません:
I have an idea. Can we leave this matter in
your hands for the time being?

284800.「う うん……わかった。\n じゃあ 私は これまでのことを お父さまに\n 報:
Uh... okay. Well, I'm going back to Azlan to
tell my father what I've done so far.

284801.「よろしくね ユーライザさん。\n ヤマカミヌ王のたづなは 私が持っておくから\:
Nice to meet you, Yuliza. I'll hold on to the
tazuna of Yamakaminu King, so let me know
if you find anything out.

284802.「ずっと 考えていたのですが……。\n ヤマカミヌの王 コウリンという名には\n:
I've been thinking about it for a while now
and the name Yamakaminu King Kourin sounded
familiar.

284803.「じつは 彼も 英雄の候補にあがっていました。\n それほどの者なら フォーリオ:
As a matter of fact, he was in the running for
hero. If he's that good, maybe we can get a
lead on how to resurrect that soul in Fourion.

284804.「天使長なら 何か知っているはずです。\n フォーリオンの 聖天舎にいる 天使長:
The Archangel should know something. Let's go
talk to the Archangel in Fourion's monastery.

284805.「今から ヤマカミヌの王 コウリンの魂を\n 呼び戻す儀式を 行います。:
We will now perform a ceremony to bring back
the soul of Kourin, the Yamakaminu King.

284806.「そのためには この転生の花と 呼び出す死者に\n ゆかりの深い品が 必要です。:
To do so, I need this Rebirth Flower and an object closely associated with the dead whom I invoke. Please lend me the Tazuna of
Yamakaminu King.

284807.「えっと その お花があれば\n あの王様を 生き返らせることができるの？:
So, with those flowers, you can bring that
king back from the dead?

284808.「この転生の花は 魂を育む 特別な花なのです。:
This Rebirth Flower is a special flower that
nurtures the soul.

284809.「花のチカラを借りれば 完全に生き返らすことは\n できなくても 一時的に魂を呼:
With the help of flowers, even if we can't bring them back to life completely, we should be able to temporarily bring their souls back
to life.

284810.「ヤマカミヌの王 コウリンよ……。\n 我 ユーライザの名のもとに\n 今ここに:
Kourin, King of Yamakaminu... I, Yuliza,
hereby summon thee!

284811.「コウリンよ 気高き魂よ。\n 我が声に応え 転生の花の香りをたどり\n この地:
O Kourin, noble soul! Respond to my voice,
follow the fragrance of the Rebirth Flower,
and descend to this land!

284813.「わあ……！\n とっても立派な カムシカだね！\n あなたの お名前は？:
Wow...! You are a very handsome Azlantelope!
What is your name?

284814.「ん？ ほんとだ～。\n ここに呼ばれて来る前は なかったんだよ。:
Hmm? It's true. It wasn't there before I was
called here.

284815.「空から光がさして そこから 僕の名前を\n 呼ぶ声が聞こえて……その光の方に:
There was a light from the sky, and I heard a voice calling my name... I ran towards the light desperately, and before I knew it, I was
here.

284816.「その時に ついたのかなあ？\n でも……なんだか 懐かしい匂いがするよ。\n:
I wonder if it came on at that time. But... it
smells nostalgic. It's like I've been wearing
it for a long time.

284817.「審判の天使 フェディーラ様から\n 聞いていましたが……確かに あなたの名は\:
I was told by the Angel of Judgement, Lady
Fedira, that your name was indeed Kourin.

284818.「国王コウリンと 同じ名前だからとはいえ\n あなたの方が来てしまうとは 予想外:
I did not expect you to come, even though you share the same name as King Kourin. After all, it seems that it is difficult to summon
ancient souls.

284819.「僕の中には ハクオウ父さんから\n もらったチカラが 今も あるんだ。\n だ:
I still have the power inside me that Hakuo
gave me. That's why I can feel it even when
we're apart.

284820.「ハクオウ父さんは 今 すごく苦しんでる。\n だから 今度は 僕が チカラにな:
Father Hakuo is suffering a lot right now.
That's why I'm going to help him this time.

284821.「今の僕なら もう前みたいに\n ただ 守ってもらうだけじゃない。\n 一緒に:
If it's me now, I won't just ask you to
protect me like before. Let's go save Hakuo
together!

284822.「私も 一緒に行くよ！\n コウリンさんは 私にたづなを託してくれた。\n だか:
I'm coming with you! Kourin entrusted me with
the tazuna. So I think there is something
I can do too.

284823.「ヤマカミヌ王に 説得してもらう予定とは \n 違ってしまいましたが あなたと:
Though it was not my plan to have Yamakaminu King convince you, you and Hakuo have a father-son bond that was nurtured through the
Deep Green Trials.

284824.「あなたの声なら ハクオウも耳を貸すかも……。\n 代案とはいえ 意外に いける:
If it's your voice, maybe Hakuo will listen to you... Although it's just an alternative, it might be surprisingly good. Let's head for the
stone monument in Sunset Meadow together!

284825.「この心域は ハクオウが創りだしたもの……。\n いわば この空間全体が ハクオ:
This mind-region was created by Hakuo... so to speak, this entire space is like Hakuo himself, so it would be difficult to identify
his presence.

284827.「やはり 私のような者が 親代わりになるのは\n 間違っていましたね。今も こう:
After all, it was wrong for someone like me to
take the role of a parent. Even now, I am
causing you grief...

284828.「ここから 立ち去りなさい！\n たとえ あなたの言葉であろうと\n 私は ここ:
Get out of here! I'm not going to move, even
if it's your word against mine.

284830.「目ざわりだ！ 消えろと言っている！:
I can't stand looking at you! Get out of my
sight!

284833.「父さんの わからず屋っ！\n だったら 僕が チカラずくで\n 目を覚まさせて:
You're so clueless, Dad! Then I'll do
everything in my power to wake you up!

284834.「僕を 追い返そうとしても 無駄だからね！\n こんな闇 消してやる！:
You can't turn me away! I'm gonna make this
darkness go away!

284835.「……よかった。コウリンのおかげで\n 追い出されるのは 避けられたようですね。:
...thank goodness. It looks like Kourin has
saved you from being kicked out.

284836.「さっきので 父さんの気配がハッキリと\n 感じられるようになったよ。 \n 父:
Now I can clearly feel Dad's presence. He's
behind this door.

284837.「……なるほど。では 扉の先を目指しましょう。 \n ですが この扉には ５つも:
I see. Then, let's go to the end of the door.
But it seems that there are five keys on this
door.

284838.「ここは ハクオウの心の世界です。 \n おそらく このカギ穴も 他者の侵入を拒:
This is the world of Hakuo's mind. Perhaps
this keyhole is also a form of Hakuo's mind,
which refuses the intrusion of others.

284839.「拒絶は強い……ですが この扉を開ける \n カギもまた 心のどこかに あるはず:
Rejection is strong...but the key to open this
door must also be somewhere in your heart.
Let's go looking for it.

284840.「あれほど言ったのに ここまで\n 土足で踏み入るとは……あなたたちは\n よほ:
To step in here with your feet in the dirt
after I told you so much...you people must be
in such a hurry to die.

284841.「僕は……とても うれしかったんだ。\n だから たとえ 父さんに拒まれたとして:
I was... so happy. So even if my father
rejects me, I won't give up!

284843.「大切な友も……美しい故郷も……\n 何もかも なくなってしまった。:
My dear friends... my beautiful hometown...
everything is gone.

284844.「愛するものを失うのは 死よりも\n つらいこと……。いっそ 最初から\n 持っ:
Losing something you love is harder than
death... so much so that it would be better
not to have it in the first place.

284845.「あんな絶望は……私だけで たくさんです。\n もう 誰にも 同じ思いはさせない:
I've had enough of that despair. I won't let
anyone else go through the same thing.

284846.「災厄の王による 滅びは必然……\n 抵抗するのなら この手で\n 息の根を 止:
The destruction by the King of Calamity is
inevitable... and if you resist, you will be
choked to death with your own hands.

284847.「そのほうが チカラおよばぬ 絶望を知り\n 失意の中で死ぬよりも……ずっといい:
It is much better to die in despair than to
die in despair knowing that you are powerless
to help!

284849.「フウラちゃん！\n ここは危ないから 僕の背に乗って！: Fuura! It's not safe here. Get on my back!

284851.「僕が フウラちゃんを守るから\n 母さんは ハクオウ父さんをお願い！:
I'll protect Fuura, so you take care of Dad
Hakuo!

284852.「僕が フウラちゃんを守るから\n 父さんは ハクオウ父さんをお願い！:
I'll protect Fuura, so you take care of Dad
Hakuo!

284853.「わからず屋な ハクオウ父さんの目を\n ガツンと 覚ましてあげて！: Wake up the clueless father Hakuo!

284854.「私を止めたければ 殺しなさい。\n 私が死ぬか あなたが死ぬか……\n 道は:
If you want to stop me, kill me. Either I die
or you die... one way or the other!

284855.「本気のようですね……。\n ここは 戦うしかありません！\n いきましょう <:
They seem to be serious... we have to fight
them here! Let's go <cs_pchero>!

284856.「お前は 私を信じると 言ってくれたのに……\n すまない……コウリン……。:
You told me you believed me... but I'm
sorry... Kourin...

284857.「もう やめようよ！\n これ以上 傷つく父さんを 見たくないよ。\n 僕たちと:
Let's just stop this! I don't want to see you
hurt anymore. Come home with us...

284858.「だまれ……だまれ だまれ だまれ！ \n もう 何もかも うんざりだ！:
Shut up, shut up, shut up, shut up! I'm fed up
with everything!

284863.「今になって私を あざ笑いに来たのか！\n お前に託された国も守れず \n 災厄:
You come here now to mock me! I, who could not defend the land entrusted to me by you, who was defeated by the King of Calamity and
scattered to the wicked!

284864.「私が 死んだ後も……最後の瞬間まで\n 屈することなく よくぞ戦ってくれた。:
Even after I was dead... you fought well and
did not give in until the last moment.

284868.「もう お前も わかっているんだろう？: You already know that, don't you?

284869.「いやだ……。一緒に戦って……\n また お前のように 失ってしまったら……？\:
No... what if we fight together... and I lose
it again, like you? I can't take it
anymore.

284870.「そういうことも……あるかもしれないよ。\n でも 僕は 一緒に戦って 死ぬんだ:
That may happen. But if we die fighting
together, I will have no regrets.

284871.「それよりも 父さんを\n ひとりで戦わせる方が ずっと嫌だよ！: I'd rather my father not fight alone!

284872.「昔から 何度も言っているだろう。\n まったく……お前は 本当に\n 筋金入り:
I've told you many times in the past. You
really are a hardcore clueless bastard,
aren't you?

284873.「……逃げたようだな。\n お前は今も 災厄の王との戦いに\n 囚われている。:
...I see you have escaped. You are still
trapped in a battle with the King of Calamity.

284874.「あれは お前の妄執が 作り出した幻影だ。\n お前自身のチカラで 倒さなければ:
That was an illusion created by your delusion.
If you don't defeat it with your own power,
Magatkaze won't stop.

284875.「今度は 間違うなよ。\n わが親愛なる友……ハクオウよ。:
This time, don't make a mistake. My dear
friend...Hakuo.

284876.「ひとりで戦えば また同じ過ちを\n くり返すことになるけれど……\n 今の私に:
If I fight alone, I will make the same
mistakes again, but I have you guys now.

284877.「敵は 強大にして凶悪……\n 命を落とすことも あるかもしれません。\n です: The enemy is powerful and vicious, and you may even lose your life. But will you fight with us against the King of Calamity?

284878.「へへっ……よかった……。\n やっと 元のハクオウ父さんに\n 戻った感じだね:
Hehe... thank goodness... You finally feel
like the original Father Hakuo again.

284879.「僕も 一緒に 戦いたいけど \n さっきので チカラを\n 使い果たしちゃった:
I wish I could fight with you, but I think I
used up all my strength earlier.

284880.「フウラちゃんも つらそうだから\n 一緒に 先に戻ってるよ。:
Fuura is going back first, since it looks like
it's going to be hard on her.

284881.「ハクオウ父さん！\n 絶対に また会おうね！ 約束だよ！:
Dad Hakuo! I promise I'll see you again! I
promise!

284883.「ここまで来てくれて ありがとう。\n 不出来な親には もったいないくらい\n:
Thank you for coming this far. You've grown up
to be such a good child, too good for your
inadequate parents.

284884.「災厄の王は この奥にいます。\n 今度こそ 決着をつけに 行きましょう。:
The King of Calamity is in the back. This
time, let's go settle this.

284885.「できることなら その方々に 謝りたい。\n そして ありがとうと 伝えたい。:
If I could, I would like to apologize to them.
And I want to tell them thank you.

284886.「ですが それは ６０００年前のこと。\n もう かなうことはありません。:
But that was 6,000 years ago. It is no longer
possible.

284887.「だから せめて……この感謝の想いを胸に\n 今 私にできることを するだけです:
So, at the very least... with this feeling of
gratitude in my heart, I will only do what I
can do now.

284888.「仲間と チカラを合わせ\n 今度こそ 災厄の王を 倒します！:
Together with our companions, we will defeat
the King of Calamity this time!

284889.「いいでしょう。歴代最強と言われた\n 二代目 時の王者の実力\n 見せていただ:
All right. Shall we see the power of the
second generation champion of time, who was
said to be the strongest of all time?

284891.「あれほど恐れた敵を 前にしているはずなのに\n 今 私の心は 驚くほど凪いでい:
I am facing an enemy that I feared so much,
and yet my mind is remarkably calm.

284892.「仲間と共に戦うとは……\n こんなにも チカラ強いものなのですね。:
To fight together with one's companions is
such a powerful thing.

284894.「英雄に選ばれなければ 私は 今も\n 死に際の妄執に 囚われ続けていました。:
Had I not been chosen to be a hero, I would
still be haunted by my mortal delusions.

284895.「そんな私の 心の奥底にある\n いやしがたい傷に 呪炎は とり憑きました。:
The Fiend's Flame haunted the unhealable
wound deep in my heart.

284896.「確かに 呪炎によって 暴走はしましたが\n 悪神となっていた私の言動は まぎれ:
It is true that I was driven wild by the Fiend's
Flame, but my words and actions as a fiend
were unmistakably my own true intentions.

284897.「ひとりでは ダメだとしても 皆がいる。\n 皆の言う通り……私は 本当に\n:
Even if you can't do it alone, you have
everyone. You're all right...I really have
been terribly clueless.

284898.「妄執から解き放たれた 今だったら……\n 呪炎を 私から 切り離せるでしょう。:
Now that I am free of my delusion you will be
able to cut the Fiend's Flame from me.

284900.「いいでしょう。では <cs_pchero>。\n 神剣レクタリスで 呪炎を断ち:
Fair enough. Now <cs_pchero>. Please use the
Divine Sword Lectalis to cut off the Fiend's
Flame.

284901.「<cs_pchero>さん。\n あなたには 何度も 助けられっぱなしですね。:
<cs_pchero>. You have helped me out so many
times.

284902.「今は しばしの別れですが……\n いつか必ず 恩返しをさせてください。\n 本:
I'll leave you now for a while... but I'll
definitely return the favor someday. Thank you
so much.

284903.「悪神の火種は 取り除けましたし\n ハクオウの魂は 天星郷で\n しばし休めば:
Fiend's Flame has been removed, and Hakuo's
soul will recover after a short rest in
Heaven.

284904.「ですが ハクオウの心の傷に とり憑き \n 燃え広がらせた 呪炎という存在……:
But the existence of the Fiend's Flame that
haunted Hakuo's wounded heart and spread its
flames... how cruel and vile.

284905.「この企みの首謀者が 誰であろうと……\n 私が 必ず 罰してみせます。必ず……:
Whoever is behind this plot I will make sure
they are punished. I promise...

284906.「ですが 今は ひとまず アズランで待つ \n タケトラさんと フウラさんに\n:
But for now, let's head for Azlan to report to
Taketora and Fuura, who are waiting for us
there.

284907.「エルトナ大陸に 吹いていた暴風は \n もう 止んでいることでしょうが……\n:
The storm that was blowing over Eltona
Continent has probably stopped by now... but
I'm sure you're worried about it right now.

287208.フウラは 国王コウリンから\nヤマカミヌ王のたづなを 手渡された！:
Fuura was given the Tazuna of King Yamakaminu
by King Kourin!

290510.「時の王者とは……災厄の王を倒すために\n 世告げの姫に選ばれし 最強の闘士のこ:
The Champion of Time... is the most powerful fighter chosen by the Oracle Princess to defeat the King of Calamity. Hakuo... is the
savior.

290511.<pc>は\nヤマカミヌ王のたづな（だいじなもの）を\n手にいれた！<me 60:
<pc> received
the Yamakaminu King's Reins (Key Item)!<me 60>

290512.<pc>たちは 屋敷で待っていた\nフウラと合流し 空の見える所に移動した！:
<pc> and the others met up with
Fuura, and then they relocated to a place
with a view of the sky!

290513.「風に愛されし子が……お前のことを思って\n ずっと 私に呼びかけていたのだ。お:
The child beloved by the wind has been calling
out to me, thinking of you. Thanks to her, I
borrowed her body to come here.

290514.「私ひとりでは 生前と同じことになるでしょう。\n <cs_pchero>さんの: I alone will be the same as before my death. I need the power of . Will you fight the King of Calamity with me?

290515.「ありがとう……。\n 本当に……<cs_pchero>さんには\n 助けられっ:
Thanks... really... <cs_pchero> has been a
great help.
